channel.title: Excel Reports on 0x000216

item.title: Excel Report Extravaganza
item.description: I’m sure many of you already know this, but it’s easy to forget about useful features, so I wanted to share a quick reminder. Dynamics GP 10.0’s Excel Reports is a good example. I often train people on it, but it seemed like users weren’t adopting it. It turns out, they just needed a little nudge. I used to always look for reports first, but a coworker helped me realize Smartlists could often provide the same information.
